channel.title: Dokka on Jeroen Mols
channel.description: Recent content in Dokka on Jeroen Mols

item.title: Kdoc for Android libraries using Dokka
item.author: info@jeroenmols.com (Jeroen Mols)
item.description: A great way to make your library easier to use it to generate code documentation for its public interface. The default way to do this in Kotlin is to generate KDoc using the official Dokka plugin.
